original_title: 巨乳エリート囮捜査官 天才研究員の開発した発情媚薬に堕ちて 夢乃あいか
overview: Elite investigator "Aika" goes undercover at a pharmaceutical company to find out the source of a new type of aphrodisiac popular among young people. There she finds a scientist producing a drug, but she becomes overconfident and trapped by the drug's effectiveness beyond imagination. Her drugged "Aika" becomes a body that can't suppress her desires without the pleasure of hot flashes in her body. She rejects Mochi ○ "Aika" who can't stop sucking. Like every day, I'm in the state of a sex doll at the bottom where the rude people of the devil dealers are screwed into.
title: Busty Undercover Investigator Corrupted By A Lab-Grown Aphrodisiac Aika Yumeno
